Author: catlynpurrce
Text: My last boyfriend and I dated for not even 3 months (I actually don’t even know if we quite made it to two months now that I think about it), but the breakup sent me into a really hard downward spiral. It can be difficult to explain why a short relationship fucked me up so bad. I guess I mean to say, I’m sorry you’re going through this right now and I hope that it starts to get easier soon ):

Author: Colgate_Grizi7
Text: I understand what you’re going through, my breakup from my ex last summer like 11 months ago sort of kickstarted this crazy weight loss for me and it changed everything, I started becoming a literal man whore and it gave me so much validation that it sort of just became a coping mechanism and I can’t control it, every now and then I still speak to her and it makes me want to lose even more just to impress her, I recently started talking to her kind of again and it’s so weird but the few months we had together were so good and I’m so sad they had to end especially as it was no ones fault. I’m really sorry you’re going through this, I know how hard it is, I really hope things improve and get better for you, if ever you would like to talk about it I’m here for you, it would be nice to relate to someone in a similar sort of situation I think, stay strong and take care!!
